entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 06:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle ending this morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
